profile.name: Marla Mendoza
profile.bio: Hi! I'm Marla Mendoza, a passionate BSIT student at ACES Polytechnic College with a deep love for technology and innovation. I'm constantly exploring programming languages, web development, and emerging technologies to build solutions that can make a real impact. My journey in IT has taught me that every line of code is an opportunity to create something meaningful. When I'm not immersed in coding projects or studying, I love staying updated with the latest tech trends and collaborating with fellow developers to bring creative ideas to life.
